Translations.Text: Dictus to sedentary Arabs stay Vos invited face powerful people fight them they submit! Si vos obey DEUS testimentum reward vos generous recompense Vos turn again vos perfecit in the elapsus, He requite vos painful retribution
blind non est blamed crippled non est blamed aeger non est blamed Those obey DEUS His messenger He admit them gardens flowing streams Prout pro those turn He requite them painful retribution
DEUS pleased believers pledged allegiance VOS tree He knew quod est their hearts consequently He beatus them contentment rewarded them immediate victory
Additionally they gained multus spoils DEUS est Almighty Wise
DEUS promised VOS MULTUS spoils UT VOS gain He ergo advanced some benefits vos in hoc vita He withheld people's manus aggression vos rendered hoc signum believers! He sic guides vos straight path
Prout pro group vos possibly non defeat DEUS took care de them; DEUS est Omnipotent
disbelievers ever fought vos they turn circiter flee! They non habet Dominus Magister; they non habet helper
Such est deus system throughout history, vos invenit deus system est unchangeable
